text: Hey guys, my client has around 1k of data that they need to show on their CMS page, I'm thinking that hubdb with hubl in a module could be the best approach but I don't know if that will make the page slower when a user loads the page. Does anyone have experience with this? Also, are there some limitations that I should be aware of?

Hi! We need help with hubdb. The requirement is that you as a provider is located in the EU. The job is to set up a front end that publish data from table similar to this: <https://stilling.europower.no/> - But also with a category tag and a sort-function.
